Authentication service health check

request.description: Register a new user account (artist, label, or aggregator)

{
    "firstName": "Music",
    "lastName": "Label",

request.description: Register a new label account with label-specific information
Login with email and password
Login as admin user and set admin token
Refresh access token using refresh token
Get authenticated user profile information
Change user password
Request password reset email
Reset password using reset token from email
Logout from current session
Logout from all devices
Verify email address using token and code
Resend verification email to user
Create a new admin user (public endpoint - no authentication required)
Submit KYC documents and details for immediate verification. Requires email verification to be completed first. Status is automatically set to verified upon successful submission.

{

}

request.description: Submit aggregator application for admin review
Check basic release service health
Create a new basic release (single or album). Response includes next step guidance and step summary.

item.name: Update Step 1 - Cover Art & Release Info

request.description: Update step 1 with cover art and release information. Response includes next step guidance and step completion status.

item.name: Update Step 2 - Audio Files & Track Info

request.description: Update step 2 with audio files and track information. Response includes next step guidance and completion status.
Update step 3 with release date, territories, partners and copyright info
Submit completed release for admin review
Get user's releases with pagination and optional status filter. Includes step progress and next step information for each release.
Get detailed information about a specific release
Request update for a live/published release
Request takedown of a live/published release
Delete a release (not allowed for live releases)
Get all available subscription plans with pricing and features
Get specific plan details by plan ID
Create payment intent for subscription purchase
Verify Razorpay payment and activate subscription
Mock payment verification for testing purposes
Get current user's subscription details
Get user's payment transaction history
Cancel active subscription
Get all subscription plans (admin only)

body.raw:
{
    "planId": "maheshwari_premium",
    "name": "Maheshwari Premium",
    "description": "Premium plan with all features",
    "price": {
        "current": 1999,
        "original": 2499
    },
    "currency": "INR",
    "interval": "month",
    "intervalCount": 1,
    "features": {
        "unlimitedReleases": true,
        "artistProfile": true,
        "collaborateWithOthers": true,
        "metaContentId": true,

        "analyticsDemo": true,

        "assistedPlaylists": true,
        "preReleasePromo": true,
        "freeUpcCode": true,
        "freeIsrcCode": true,
        "lifetimeAvailability": true,
        "supportHours": "24_hours",
        "businessHours": true,
        "liveSupport": true,
        "dailyArtistDistribution": true,
        "worldwideAvailability": true,
        "analyticsCenter": true
    },
    "isPopular": false,
    "isBestValue": true,
    "displayOrder": 2,
    "limits": {
        "maxUploads": -1,
        "maxCollaborators": 10,
        "maxDistributionChannels": 50
    },
    "trial": {
        "enabled": true,
        "days": 7
    }
}

request.description: Create a new subscription plan (admin only)
Get detailed plan information with analytics (admin only)
Update existing subscription plan (admin only)
Delete subscription plan (admin only) - Only if no active subscribers
Activate a subscription plan (admin only)
Deactivate a subscription plan (admin only)
Get revenue summary and analytics (admin only)
Get user statistics and demographics (admin only)
Get subscription statistics and growth metrics (admin only)
Get all aggregator applications with filtering and pagination (admin only)
Get specific aggregator application details (admin only)
Approve or reject aggregator application (admin only)
Create aggregator user account after application approval (admin only)
Check admin release service health
Get all releases with admin filters (admin only)
Get releases pending admin review (admin only)
Get release statistics and counts by status (admin only)
Get detailed release information with admin data (admin only)
Approve submitted release for review (admin only)
Start processing approved release (admin only)
Publish processed release (admin only)
Make published release live (admin only)
Reject release with reason (admin only)
Process user takedown request (admin only)
